exceptions.exn: Expects a disjunctive pattern with 2 branches.

original: intros H_sc H_knot_zero H_trans. inversion H_trans as [k' H_step H_sss]. apply (subcode_sss_steps_inv_1 _ _ _ sss_step_stall_inv) in H_step. destruct H_step as [k'' [H_k_step [st' [H_sss_step H_sss']]]]. exists k''. split. - apply H_k_step. - eapply (subcode_sss_subcode_inv _ _ _ _ _ _ _ st' st'); eauto.
